techmeme.title: Epic debuts a program to reduce the royalty rate for games built with Unreal Engine from 5% to 3.5% if they launch on the Epic Game Store, starting in 2025 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
As the US and allies try to sanction Evil Corp., the UK NCA says the ransomware gang conducted cyberattacks and espionage ops on NATO allies on Kremlin orders (Ryan Gallagher/Bloomberg)
Microsoft's new Windows 11 update adds generative AI-based fill and erase options to Paint and up to 8x picture resolution upscaling to Photos, for Copilot+ PCs (Devindra Hardawar/Engadget)
The US NLRB issues a complaint accusing Apple of violating employees' rights to organize and advocate for better working conditions via allegedly unlawful rules (Daniel Wiessner/Reuters)
Microsoft begins rolling out Bing Generative Search, its answer to Google's AI Overviews, to all US users, underpinned by a mix of AI models (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
